document.docAuthor: Escalante, Patricio De Los Rios & Kotov, Alexey A.
document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of Branchiopoda (Anostraca and Cladocera) of Chilean continental waters

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of Branchiopoda (Anostraca and Cladocera) of Chilean continental waters

heading.emphasis:
Family
Macrothricidae Norman & Brady, 1867 sensu
Smirnov, 1992

subSubSection.paragraph:
Macrothrix ciliata
Vávra, 1900
. Junior synonym of
M. oviformis (
Kotov 2007
)
.

( 44 )
Macrothrix goeldi
Richard, 1897
. "près de Concepción et à Lunache” (= Limache,
32 ° 59 ' S
;
71 ° 17 ' W
)" (
Richard 1897
; Kotov & Ferrari 2010 ). A preliminary name for
Macrothrix cf. spinosa King, 1853
from South America . But this group needs to be accurately revised worldwide.

Macrothrix inflata
Daday, 1902
. Junior synonym of
M. oviformis
.

M. odontocephala
Daday, 1902
. Junior synonym of
M. oviformis
.

Macrothrix palearis
Harding, 1955
. Junior synonym of
M. atahualpa
.
